summary: You know you can use Python to make apps for desktops and the web, but did you know you can also use it to make mobile apps? Kivy is a Python GUI framework for making cross-platform multitouch applications. This talk will introduce Kivy's mobile dev stack, focusing mainly on Android. It will be made using a Kivy app on an Android device, and which was developed entirely on an Android device.
title: Getting Python All Up in Your Mobile with Kivy
